#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
const int MAXN = 200000 + 10;
int c[MAXN][26], q;
char s[MAXN];

int main() {
  scanf("%s%d", s + 1, &q);
  for (int i = 1; s[i]; ++i) {
    for (int j = 0; j < 26; ++j) c[i][j] = c[i - 1][j];
    c[i][s[i] - 'a']++;
  }
  for (int _ = 0; _ < q; ++_) {
    int l, r; scanf("%d%d", &l, &r);
    int ret = 0, f = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < 26; ++i) {
      int x = c[r][i] - c[l - 1][i];
      if (x % 2 == 0) ret += x;
      else ret += x - 1, f = 1;
    }
    printf("%d\n", ret + f);
  }
  return 0;
}
